```{r}


df = ames

# Extract the relevant data
data <- df$SalePrice
mean <- mean(data)

# Set up plot
hist(data, main = "Distribution of Sale Prices", xlab = "Sale Price", ylab = "Number of Houses", col = "lightblue", border = "black")
```
